text: Do people still use <http://mybinder.org|mybinder.org> for zero-setup running of Jupyter notebooks? what do people use nowadays?

elements.text: for zero-setup running of Jupyter notebooks? what do people use nowadays?

text: I don't use binder very often, but I find it good.  it's nice you can easy enforce reproducibility with a manifest (and lock also the version of julia with `Project.toml`)
